Biocells

Generation: zero

Basic rules:

- Any live cell with two or three live neighbours survives.
- Any dead cell with three live neighbours becomes a live cell.
- All other live cells die in the next generation. Similarly, all other dead cells stay dead.

Additional rules for two colonies:

- "Neighbours" from basic rules are always have the same color.
- Dead cell becomes a live, if there are no other's three cells around with different color.
- Three+ neighbours can murder competitor cell. Who has more neighbours stay a live.
